thread.title: This jerk whipped out his selfie stick at the London attack scene | New York Post
thread.title_full: This jerk whipped out his selfie stick at the London attack scene | New York Post

author: News.com.au
title: This jerk whipped out his selfie stick at the London attack scene | New York Post
text:
There’s a time for selfies and there’s a time to put the camera away – at least as far as Twitter is concerned.
A man has found himself on the sharp end of Twitter hate after being caught with a selfie stick at the site of the London terror attacks .
Footage taken on Westminster Bridge shows an unidentified man armed with a selfie stick with waiting ambulances in the background.
He appears to be talking to the camera, but it was unclear whether he was filming a Facebook Live video or a member of the media.
Either way, the man’s actions were branded inappropriate with one Twitter user saying it was “everything that is wrong with modern society in one picture.”
Others branded him selfish and said his actions were completely inappropriate.
@Christerphurr @rachelel_ you seen that photo of a bloke with his selfie stick by Westminster bridge! Staggering and sad in equal measures.
— John (@catterallwhite) March 22, 2017 
What's worse – this man using a selfie stick to take images of tragedy or the fact that no one stopped him #westminster pic.twitter.com/ZlaCy20qAh 
— Karl Hart (@_karlhart) March 22, 2017
